alert.note: Alert for Davison; Hanson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 16 at 7:47AM MDT until June 17 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Mitchell affecting Davison and Hanson Counties. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Mitchell. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, the lower banks overflow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage later today and continue falling into the weekend. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon James River Mitchell 17.0 17.0 Fri 7 am 16.9 16.8 16.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning.
